document.full_text: an e. coli outbreak in germany which has infected more than 270 people and killed at least five is one of the biggest of its kind worldwide and the largest ever in germany, european health experts said saturday.
document.title: eu health body says german e. coli outbreak serious
lines_and_colors: an e. coli outbreak in germany which has infected more than 270 people and killed at least five is one of the biggest of its kind worldwide and the largest ever in germany, european health experts said saturday.
